meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2088.

td.p: Curt Kronish, a systems administrator from Dover, New Jersey
Bob Olivier, a marketing director from Bethesda, Maryland
Joy Bell, a registered nurse from Columbia, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,200)

tr.td: U.S. STATES
ACTORS ONSTAGE
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
5-LETTER BIRDS
CAPS

2-day champion: $15,700
2nd place: trip on TWA to New Orleans & stay at The Maison Dupuy Hotel + Jeopardy! home game
3rd place: Swintec SF1200 fax machine & Sega Genesis and Super Nintendo versions of Jeopardy! & Wheel of Fortune + Jeopardy! home game
Joy
Bob
Curt
